Reference

Goodness-of-fit tests

Data driven smooth tests for selected goodness-of-fit problems

ddst.exp.test()

Data Driven Smooth Test for Exponentiality

ddst.extr.test()

Data Driven Smooth Test for Extreme Value Distribution

ddst.norm.test()

Data Driven Smooth Test for Normality

ddst.uniform.test()

Data Driven Smooth Test for Uniformity

Nonparametric tests

Nonparametric data driven smooth tests for comparing distributions

ddst.ksample.test()

Data Driven k-Sample Test

ddst.twosample.test()

Data Driven Two-Sample Test

ddst.stochasticdominance.test()

Data Driven Two-Sample Test for Stochastic Dominance

ddst.stochasticorder.test()

Data Driven Nonparametric Test for Stochastic Ordering

ddst.umbrella.test()

Data Driven Test for k-Sample Umbrella Alternatives

ddst.upward.test()

Data Driven Test for Upward Trend

Other

plot(<ddst.test>)

Plot Function fo Data Driven Tests
